meanings.definition: The beliefs or practices of a group of people who follow the teachings of bourbon.
meanings.sent1: Many enjoy discussing bourbonisms at the local distillery.
meanings.sent2: She was well-versed in bourbonisms and could talk for hours about different blends.
meanings.sent3: At the bourbon tasting event, they joked about creating their own set of bourbonisms.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to bourbonisms was as strong as oak barrels aging whiskey.
meanings.sent5: The book on bourbonisms made the topic come alive with stories and traditions.

meanings.definition: The distinctive language or expressions used by bourbon enthusiasts.
meanings.sent1: The guide explained the various bourbonisms to the visitors.
meanings.sent2: In their conversations, they often used bourbonisms that only true enthusiasts understood.
meanings.sent3: His collection of bourbonisms included quirky phrases and terms from distilleries.
meanings.sent4: The richness of bourbonisms painted a flavorful picture of the whiskey world.
meanings.sent5: Learning the unique bourbonisms added a new layer of enjoyment to the hobby.

meanings.definition: The actions or behaviors characteristic of bourbon enthusiasts.
meanings.sent1: His bourbonisms included attending tastings and collecting rare bottles.
meanings.sent2: The group's shared bourbonisms led them to explore distilleries together.
meanings.sent3: She playfully imitated the bourbonisms of famous whiskey connoisseurs.
meanings.sent4: The dedication shown through their bourbonisms was truly admirable.
meanings.sent5: Their bourbonisms shone brightly during the annual bourbon festival.
